column4: Is there a reason to install Gnash over Flash? or is Gnash just for if you can't use Flash for some reason?
mostly, also for ppc and amd64 native, and for the purists
don't get me wrong, for someone who wants to put in the effort of configuring mutt, it's an amazingly fast and usable client
Have you used the KDE PIM much?
I've tried it, but for some reason kde & I just don't quite mesh
it has persistent alarms, calendar, the tasks & appointments show up under the clock, etc. etc
Euros don't really work for me, lol
Can you download transactions from financial institutions? or do you have to maintain it manually?
it'll import quicken format from banks, yes
automatically? or just if you goto the site and download the export file?
